name: Inverted (itch) (Alley)
description:
Game Platform Analysis midterm project. The goal was to make a game for a fictional piece of game hardware akin to the Gameboy.  Made in unity

Allison Terry(Me): level design, world design, in engine bug fixing(unity)

Jacob Audick: All programming and music, in programming bug fixes

Kaelan Hill: All sprites and animation
